page.title: 15Population
page.content: Seamer is a dormitory villiage.This means that the majority of inhabitants of Seamer do not work there.The pop- ulation of Seamer has changed consid- erably in the past 80 years.The pop- ulation figures are shown below. 1901=711. 1911=690. 1921=613. 1931=743 1941=(2nd World War-no census figures) 1951=910(1487). 1961=1205. 1971=2841. 1981=2988. In 1953 the boundary of Seamer Parish excluded the new East- field estate.The figure in brackets is the recorded population of Seamer in- cluding Eastfield in 1951.However the figure of 91O based on the current Parish boundary is a more realistic figure of the population of Seamer at this time.After Eastfield had been excluded from Seamer Parish the pop- ulation increased by 2060 between 1951 and 1975.
